intro: Pleurostachys stricta, commonly known as the rigid pleurostachys, is a species of flowering plant in the family Poaceae. It is native to Mexico and is characterized by its tall, erect growth habit and narrow, grass-like leaves. The plant produces small, spike-like inflorescences that bear tiny, pale green flowers. It thrives in well-drained soils and full sun, often found in dry, rocky habitats. Due to its ornamental value and ecological significance, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens and conservation programs.
